title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Gongjin Electronics' shares to halt trading from Oct 19
text:
BRIEF-Shenzhen Gongjin Electronics' shares to halt trading from Oct 19 
Oct 16 Shenzhen Gongjin Electronics Co Ltd 
* Says shares to halt trading from Oct. 19 pending announcement 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1Mtsjfs 
Further company coverage: (Reporting By Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
